name: Finder Love: Hara Fumina: Futari no Futari de...
overview: Finder Love is a combination gravure picture disk and love sim focusing on a hot Japanese idol girls (each edition focuses on one girl, this one featuring Hara Fumina). The game lets players interact with the hotties and snap pictures which can be tranked for quality and then be traded with friends. You play as a newbie cameraman who must get the girls to look their best during photo shoots. As you work through a storyline in the adventure mode, you'll end up playing a few mini games with your favorite idol!
